HomePage.slogan: "With heart, soul and by the law"
HomePage.description: Uniting Armenians worldwide through cryptocurrency. Supporting children and families from Artsakh and those in need. 10% of all funds go directly to verified charity support.
HomePage.missionDescription: Supporting children and families from Artsakh and those in need across Armenia through transparent, verified charitable giving powered by blockchain technology.
HomePage.globalFamily: Every person around the ArmenianCoin represents our global family united by compassion. Together, we transcend borders to provide direct support to those who need it most - children and families from Artsakh and throughout Armenia.
HomePage.charityHighlight: 10% of all funds go directly to verified charity support
HomePage.valuesDescription: Our foundation rests on the pillars of Armenian heritage: family unity, community support, and unwavering commitment to helping those in need.
HomePage.heartSoulDesc: Every action we take comes from the heart. Supporting Artsakh families and Armenian children with genuine compassion and unwavering dedication to their wellbeing.
HomePage.globalUnityDesc: Connecting Armenians worldwide through shared purpose. Our diaspora's strength lies in unity, working together to support our homeland and preserve our heritage.
HomePage.byLawDesc: Operating with complete transparency and legal compliance. Every charitable contribution is verified, tracked, and reported to ensure maximum impact and trust.
HomePage.featuresDescription: ArmenianCoin (ARMT) is more than cryptocurrency—it's a bridge connecting our global diaspora to Armenia while directly funding humanitarian support for those in need.
HomePage.feature1Desc: Secure, reliable blockchain infrastructure with global accessibility
HomePage.feature2Desc: Fixed supply ensuring scarcity and potential value appreciation
HomePage.feature3Desc: Direct support for Artsakh families and Armenian children in need
HomePage.feature4Desc: Full visibility into charitable fund allocation and impact
HomePage.growthPotentialDesc: Built for sustainable value with charitable impact
HomePage.communityDrivenDesc: Decisions made by our global Armenian family
HomePage.joinMissionDesc: Be part of something greater. Every ARMT token you hold contributes to supporting Armenian children and families in need. Together, we can make a real difference.

AboutPage.title: About ArmenianCoin
AboutPage.subtitle: "With heart, soul and by the law"
AboutPage.description: ArmenianCoin represents more than cryptocurrency—it's a movement uniting Armenians worldwide to support children and families from Artsakh and those in need throughout Armenia.
AboutPage.missionDescription: 10% of all funds go directly to verified charity support for those in need
AboutPage.why1: The Armenian diaspora spans the globe, but our hearts remain connected to our homeland. ArmenianCoin bridges this distance, creating a direct pathway for Armenians worldwide to support families and children in Armenia, especially those from Artsakh who face ongoing challenges.
AboutPage.why2: Through blockchain technology, we ensure every contribution is transparent, verified, and reaches those who need it most. This isn't just about cryptocurrency—it's about preserving our values of family, community, and helping those in need.
AboutPage.why3: Our slogan "With heart, soul and by the law" reflects our commitment to operating with genuine compassion while maintaining complete legal compliance and transparency.
AboutPage.coreValuesSubtitle: Built on the foundation of Armenian heritage and guided by principles that have sustained our people through centuries.
AboutPage.heartSoulDesc: Every action we take comes from genuine compassion. We support Artsakh families and Armenian children with unwavering dedication, treating each contribution as a sacred trust from our global community.
AboutPage.globalUnityDesc: Our diaspora's strength lies in unity. Armenians from Los Angeles to Paris, from Buenos Aires to Sydney, all connected by shared purpose and cultural pride, working together to support our homeland.
AboutPage.byLawDesc: Complete transparency and legal compliance guide everything we do. Every charitable contribution is verified, tracked, and reported, ensuring maximum impact and maintaining the trust our community places in us.
AboutPage.howItWorksSubtitle: A transparent, blockchain-powered system that connects global Armenian support directly to families and children in need.
AboutPage.step1Desc: Buy ArmenianCoin tokens through our secure platform using MetaMask or other Ethereum wallets.
AboutPage.step2Desc: 10% of all funds are automatically allocated to our verified charity support program.
AboutPage.step3Desc: Funds go directly to verified families and children from Artsakh and throughout Armenia.
AboutPage.step4Desc: View detailed reports on how funds are used and the impact made in our community.
AboutPage.commitmentSubtitle: We pledge to operate with the highest standards of integrity, transparency, and compassion.

CharityPage.verifiedRecipientsDesc: All recipient families and organizations are thoroughly verified through our partner network to ensure aid reaches those who need it most.

FAQPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQPage.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about ArmenianCoin, getting started with cryptocurrency, and our mission to support Armenian families worldwide.
FAQPage.a1: ArmenianCoin (ARMT) is a cryptocurrency token designed to unite the global Armenian diaspora and support families and children in Armenia. Built on secure blockchain technology with Armenian cultural symbols (Mount Ararat, church, vine), ARMT provides holders with opportunities for growth while funding meaningful humanitarian initiatives within the Armenian community.
FAQPage.q2: How do I buy ARMT tokens?
FAQPage.a2: To buy ARMT tokens, you need to: (1) Create a MetaMask wallet, (2) Fund it with ETH, (3) Connect your wallet to our platform, and (4) Swap ETH for ARMT tokens. Our beginner's guide provides detailed step-by-step instructions for each process, making it easy even for cryptocurrency newcomers.
FAQPage.q3: Is it safe to invest in ArmenianCoin?
FAQPage.a3: While ARMT is built on secure Ethereum blockchain technology with audited smart contracts, all cryptocurrency investments carry inherent risks. Prices can be volatile, and you should never invest more than you can afford to lose. We recommend doing your own research and consulting with financial advisors before making any investment decisions.
FAQPage.q4: What blockchain is ARMT built on?
FAQPage.a4: ArmenianCoin (ARMT) is built on the Ethereum blockchain, which provides security, transparency, and compatibility with popular wallets like MetaMask. This ensures reliable transactions, easy integration with decentralized exchanges, and access to the robust Ethereum ecosystem.
FAQPage.a5: Transaction fees (gas fees) depend on the Ethereum network congestion at the time of your transaction. Fees typically range from $5-50 but can be higher during peak usage. We recommend checking current gas prices before making transactions and considering transactions during off-peak hours for lower fees.
FAQPage.q6: Can I store ARMT in any wallet?
FAQPage.a6: Yes, ARMT can be stored in any Ethereum-compatible wallet, including MetaMask, Trust Wallet, Coinbase Wallet, and hardware wallets like Ledger or Trezor. Make sure to add the ARMT token contract address to see your balance in wallets that don't automatically detect it.
FAQPage.q7: How does ARMT support Armenian families?
FAQPage.a7: ARMT is designed with community support at its core. A portion of transaction fees and token reserves are allocated to humanitarian programs supporting Armenian families and children in Armenia. Token holders can participate in governance decisions about how these funds are distributed, ensuring transparency and community involvement.
FAQPage.q8: How can I get involved in the ArmenianCoin community?
FAQPage.a8: You can join our global Armenian community through our official social media channels, participate in governance voting as a token holder, contribute to community discussions, and help spread awareness about our mission. We welcome all community members who share our values of family unity, cultural preservation, and helping those in need.
FAQPage.q9: What if I need help or have problems?
FAQPage.a9: If you encounter any issues or need assistance, you can reach out through our official support channels. We have community moderators and technical support available to help with wallet setup, transactions, and general questions. Always verify you're contacting official support to avoid scams.
FAQPage.stillNeedHelpDesc: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our Armenian community and support team are here to help.
FAQPage.communitySupportDesc: Join our Armenian community channels for peer-to-peer help and discussions.
FAQPage.technicalSupportDesc: Get help with wallet setup, transactions, and technical issues.

GuidePage.title: Beginner's Guide to ArmenianCoin
GuidePage.subtitle: New to cryptocurrency? No problem! Follow our simple 4-step process to safely set up your wallet and purchase ARMT tokens to join our global Armenian community.
GuidePage.step1Desc: Set up your secure cryptocurrency wallet
GuidePage.step1a: Visit metamask.io and download the browser extension
GuidePage.step1b: Install MetaMask for Chrome, Firefox, Brave, or Edge
GuidePage.step1c: Click "Create a Wallet" and follow the setup process
GuidePage.step1d: Write down your 12-word recovery phrase and store it safely
GuidePage.step1e: Never share your recovery phrase with anyone
GuidePage.step2Desc: Add cryptocurrency to your MetaMask wallet
GuidePage.step2b: Click "Buy" to purchase ETH with a credit card or bank transfer
GuidePage.step2c: Alternatively, transfer ETH from another exchange (Coinbase, Binance, etc.)
GuidePage.step2d: Wait for the transaction to confirm (usually 5-15 minutes)
GuidePage.step2e: Ensure you have enough ETH to cover transaction fees (gas)
GuidePage.step3Desc: Link your wallet to our platform
GuidePage.step3b: Click "Connect Wallet" in the top right corner
GuidePage.step3c: Select MetaMask from the wallet options
GuidePage.step3d: Approve the connection in your MetaMask popup
GuidePage.step3e: Your wallet address will now be displayed on the site
GuidePage.step4a: Enter the amount of ARMT you want to purchase
GuidePage.step4b: Review the exchange rate and transaction details
GuidePage.step4c: Click "Swap" or "Buy ARMT" to initiate the trade
GuidePage.step4d: Confirm the transaction in your MetaMask wallet
GuidePage.security1: Never share your recovery phrase with anyone
GuidePage.security2: Store your recovery phrase offline and securely
GuidePage.security3: Always verify website URLs before connecting
GuidePage.security4: Start with small amounts while learning
GuidePage.scam2: Phishing emails asking for wallet details
GuidePage.scam3: Social media messages offering free tokens
GuidePage.ctaDesc: Check out our FAQ section for answers to common questions, or reach out to our Armenian community for support and guidance.

HowToBuyPage.title: How to Buy ARMT
HowToBuyPage.subtitle: New to cryptocurrency? No problem! Follow our simple 4-step process to safely set up your wallet and purchase ARMT tokens to join our mission of supporting Armenian families and children.
HowToBuyPage.stepsSubtitle: Follow these easy steps to purchase ARMT tokens and join our global Armenian community.
HowToBuyPage.step1Desc: Set up your secure cryptocurrency wallet
HowToBuyPage.step1a: Visit metamask.io and download the browser extension
HowToBuyPage.step1b: Install MetaMask for Chrome, Firefox, Brave, or Edge
HowToBuyPage.step1c: Click "Create a Wallet" and follow the setup process
HowToBuyPage.step1d: Write down your 12-word recovery phrase and store it safely
HowToBuyPage.step1e: Never share your recovery phrase with anyone
HowToBuyPage.step2Desc: Add Ethereum (ETH) to your MetaMask wallet
HowToBuyPage.step2b: Click "Buy" to purchase ETH with a credit card or bank transfer
HowToBuyPage.step2c: Alternatively, transfer ETH from another exchange (Coinbase, Binance, etc.)
HowToBuyPage.step2d: Wait for the transaction to confirm (usually 5-15 minutes)
HowToBuyPage.step2e: Ensure you have enough ETH to cover transaction fees (gas)
HowToBuyPage.step3Desc: Link your wallet to our platform
HowToBuyPage.step3b: Click "Connect Wallet" in the top right corner
HowToBuyPage.step3c: Select MetaMask from the wallet options
HowToBuyPage.step3d: Approve the connection in your MetaMask popup
HowToBuyPage.step3e: Your wallet address will now be displayed on the site
HowToBuyPage.step4a: Enter the amount of ARMT you want to purchase
HowToBuyPage.step4b: Review the exchange rate and transaction details
HowToBuyPage.step4c: Click "Swap" or "Buy ARMT" to initiate the trade
HowToBuyPage.step4d: Confirm the transaction in your MetaMask wallet
HowToBuyPage.step4f: Your ARMT tokens will appear in your wallet
HowToBuyPage.safetySubtitle: Protect yourself and your investment with these essential security practices
HowToBuyPage.security1: Never share your recovery phrase with anyone, ever
HowToBuyPage.security2: Store recovery phrase offline in a secure location
HowToBuyPage.security3: Always verify website URLs before connecting your wallet
HowToBuyPage.security4: Start with small amounts while learning
HowToBuyPage.security5: Use official MetaMask extension only from metamask.io
HowToBuyPage.scam1: Fake MetaMask extensions or phishing websites
HowToBuyPage.scam2: Phishing emails asking for wallet details or recovery phrases
HowToBuyPage.scam3: Social media messages offering free tokens or "airdrops"
HowToBuyPage.scam4: Unsolicited investment advice or guaranteed returns
HowToBuyPage.scam5: Fake customer support asking for private keys
HowToBuyPage.rememberDesc: ArmenianCoin team will NEVER ask for your private keys, recovery phrase, or passwords. Always verify communications through our official channels.
HowToBuyPage.contractInfoDesc: Official contract details for ArmenianCoin (ARMT) on Ethereum
HowToBuyPage.contractNote: Contract address will be provided upon token launch. Always verify the official contract address through our verified channels before making any transactions.

TokenomicsPage.title: ARMT Tokenomics
TokenomicsPage.subtitle: Transparent and sustainable token economics designed to maximize charitable impact while ensuring long-term value for our global Armenian community.
TokenomicsPage.overviewDesc: ArmenianCoin (ARMT) is built on Ethereum with a fixed supply designed for sustainable growth and maximum charitable impact.
TokenomicsPage.fixedSupplyDesc: With a total supply of 1 billion ARMT tokens, our fixed supply model ensures scarcity and potential value appreciation while dedicating a significant portion to charitable causes.
TokenomicsPage.distributionDesc: Carefully planned distribution to ensure maximum impact for charitable causes while maintaining sustainable tokenomics.
TokenomicsPage.publicSaleDesc: Available for public purchase to fund the project and charity initiatives
TokenomicsPage.charityReserveDesc: Dedicated fund for supporting Armenian families and children from Artsakh
TokenomicsPage.developmentDesc: Platform development, marketing, and operational expenses
TokenomicsPage.teamAdvisorsDesc: Team allocation with vesting schedule to ensure long-term commitment
TokenomicsPage.liquidityPoolDesc: Ensuring stable trading and liquidity on decentralized exchanges
TokenomicsPage.charityDesc: How the 25% charity reserve (250M ARMT) will be distributed to support Armenian families and children in need.
TokenomicsPage.artsakhFamiliesDesc: Direct support for displaced families from Artsakh
TokenomicsPage.childrenEducationDesc: Educational programs and scholarships for Armenian children
TokenomicsPage.emergencyReliefDesc: Emergency assistance for urgent community needs
TokenomicsPage.continuousCharityDesc: In addition to the 25% charity reserve, 10% of all ongoing funds from token transactions and platform revenue will continuously support our charitable initiatives.
TokenomicsPage.continuousCharityNote: This ensures sustainable, long-term support for Armenian families and children in need.
TokenomicsPage.economicDesc: Designed for sustainable growth, community benefit, and maximum charitable impact.
TokenomicsPage.deflationaryDesc: Fixed supply with increasing demand creates natural deflationary pressure, potentially increasing token value over time.
TokenomicsPage.communityDesc: Token holders participate in governance decisions and receive updates on charitable impact, creating strong community engagement.
TokenomicsPage.impactDesc: As token value increases, the charitable impact multiplies, creating more resources to support Armenian families and children.
TokenomicsPage.vestingDesc: Transparent vesting ensures long-term commitment and prevents market manipulation.
TokenomicsPage.ctaDesc: Be part of a sustainable economic model that creates value for holders while making a real difference for Armenian families and children in need.
